Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Circumcision:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V] afswp e~rof m~picebi kata petecse qen pinomoc: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ, the Son of God, accepted to Himself the circumcision, according to the custom of the law. Alleluia, Alleluia.
الليلويا الليلويا يسوع المسيح ابن الله قبل اليه الختان كما ينبغي بالناموس. الليلويا الليلويا
